replies.onlyOwner:
```diff
- Are you bored? This command is not for you! Don't touch it!```
replies.botPerm:
-# **I (the bot) do not have the necessary permissions to run the command {mention_command}!!
Required permissions: [{bot_perms}]**
replies.userPerm:
-# **You do not have the required permissions to use the command {mention_command}!! 
Required permissions: [{user_perms}]**
replies.cooldown: -# **You have been temporarily blocked from using the command {mention_command} due to spamming. You can use it again after <t:{expired_timestamp}:R>.**
replies.noChannelError:
```diff
- You need to join a voice channel.```
replies.notMatchedVoice:
```diff
- Your voice channel doesn't match mine. Please join the one I am in.```
replies.noPermToView:
```diff
- I cannot see the channel. Please give me the 'View Channel' permission.```
replies.noPermToConnect:
```diff
- I cannot join the channel. Please give me the 'Connect to Channel' permission.```
replies.userDeaf:
```diff
- You cannot use this command while you are deafened.```
replies.clientMute:
```diff
- Please unmute me first, then try again.```

setup.description: Register the server settings in the database.

panel.description: Create a control panel for the radio player.

replies.success: AFK mode has been successfully activated on this server.
replies.doDeleteChannel: -# **To set up the panel in your desired channel, make sure to select it. The channel <#{channel}> has been set for the panel in this server. If you'd like to delete it, click one of the buttons below.**
replies.noChannel:
```diff
- You must mention a text channel.```
replies.deleteChannel: The channel has been successfully deleted from the database.

prefix.description: Set a custom prefix in the server database.

afk.description: Activate AFK mode for the server's voice channel.

embed.author: Bot Help
embed.value1:
>>> Hello, I am {username}.
I am a fun and management bot, helping admins manage the server easily while entertaining members and solving their problems.
embed.value2: >>> To see all my commands, click on the menu below this message and check the commands by category.

replies.paused: The player has been successfully paused.

play.description: Play music in the voice channel.

stop.description: Stop and remove the player in the voice channel.
